member.name: F:Google.Apis.Blogger.v3.BlogsResource.ListByUserRequest.RoleEnum.READER
member.summary: Reader role - Blogs where the user has Reader level access (to a private blog).

member.summary: Retrieves a list of posts, possibly filtered.

member.summary: Retrieves a list of posts, possibly filtered.

member.summary: ID of the blog to fetch posts from.

member.summary: Latest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

member.summary: Order by the date the post was published

member.summary: Publishes a draft post, optionally at the specific time of the given publishDate parameter.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Blogger.v3.PostsResource.PublishRequest
member.summary: Publishes a draft post, optionally at the specific time of the given publishDate parameter.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Blogger.v3.PostsResource.PublishRequest.PublishDate
member.summary: Optional date and time to schedule the publishing of the Blog. If no publishDate parameter is given, the post is either published at the a previously saved schedule date (if present), or the current time. If a future date is given, the post will be scheduled to be published.

member.summary: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state.

member.summary: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state.
